document_data.name: Koopenti
document_data.mainbody: '''Koopenti''' was the [[pueblo priest]] of [[Mitzlato]] in the [[Pasocada Basin]] in [[Maztica]].
document_data.History: In [[1362 DR]], Koopenti led a welcoming of [[Sozarro]]'s expedition.
